content.question: The ruling described in the excerpt is most similar to which of the following earlier political changes?

choices.label: The enactment of universal voting rights for women during the Progressive Era
Court rulings during the Gilded Age that “separate but equal” public facilities were constitutional
The extension of citizenship rights to formerly enslaved people following the Civil War
The gradual shift of African American support to the Democratic Party during the New Deal

content.answer: The extension of citizenship rights to formerly enslaved people following the Civil War

topic.text: 8.10: The African American Civil Rights Movement (1960s)
